data.title: State key laboratory of resource and environmental information systems
meta_keywords: State key laboratory of resource and environment information system
data.meta_description: State key laboratory of resources and environment information system dedicated to the earth information science basic theory and method of research and development of core technology, geographic information system construction of major national industry to demonstrate the application system, establish a 'data model - software - system integration' of the earth information science research system, the earth information science of our country development of the discipline orientation, to demonstrate the application and the role of backbone personnel training.Since its establishment, the laboratory has actively promoted the development of earth information science with the focus on undertaking major national scientific research tasks and international cooperative research.Successively have undertaken more than 300 countries, 973, 863, science research, the national natural science foundation of China, the Chinese Academy of Sciences knowledge innovation of major projects, and international cooperation research projects at provincial and ministerial levels, involved in spatial analysis and system simulation, the space distribution pattern mining and geological knowledge discovery, the earth information science frontier technology and software system of earth system science, data integration and sharing, resources and environment information system major industry application and demonstration of different areas of the earth information science.
